text:
TIRUNELVELI

Manonmaniam Sundaranar University: 41st Senate meeting, MSU premises, Abhishekapatti, 10 a.m.

Tamil Nadu Pensioners’ Association: State executive committee meeting, M. Khader Meeran, State president, presides, Vijila Sathyananth, Rajya Sabha MP, speaks, Raj Mahal Marriage Hall, Tirunelveli Junction, 9.30 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Regular meeting, St. Xavier’s Cathedral Silver Jubilee Library Hall, Palayamkottai, 7 p.m.

VASUDEVANALLUR

S. Thangapazham Agriculture College: Traditional paddy variety festival, N. Ganesaraja, progressive farmer, Nallamuthu Agriculture Research Trust, Thatchanallur, Tirunelveli, presides, G. Chiththar, organic farmer, Thanjavur, inaugurates, S. Murugan, Inspector General of Police, South Zone, Madurai, special guest, P. Gomathinayagam and V. Antonysamy, progressive farmers, participate, college premises, 10 a.m.

IRUDHAYAKULAM

Thiruvalluvar College: NSS camp, second day events, free eye screening camp by doctors of Dr. Agarwal Eye Hospital, Tirunelveli, 10 a.m. onwards; lecture by B. Valsakumar, formerly Head, Department of Tamil, Thiruvalluvar College, 3 p.m.; folk arts, Lourdhu Annai Shrine Community Hall, 6.30 p.m.

ILANJI

Bharat Institute of Education: ‘Edufest 2016,’ M. Kanthimathi, secretary, BIE, inaugurates, 8.45 a.m.; valediction, S. Prabhakar, Controller of Examinations, Manonmaniam Sundaranar University, participates, college premises, 5.30 p.m.
title: enGaGEMENTS
